description:
I got 500 Internal Server Error on
https://servers.api.openstack.com/v1.1//{tenantId}/os-keypairs/{keyID} with Invalid KeyID

HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error　{"cloudServersFault": {"message": "Keypair %(keypair_name)s not found for user %(user_id)s", "code": 500}}

This should be 404 Not Found.
title: 500 Error on DELETE key pair with invalid keypair name
